name: Rushmore
summary: A teenager at Rushmore Academy falls for a much older teacher and befriends a middle-aged industrialist. Later, he finds out that his love interest and his friend are having an affair, which prompts him to begin a vendetta.

name: The Royal Tenenbaums
summary: The eccentric members of a dysfunctional family reluctantly gather under the same roof for various reasons.

name: The Life Aquatic
summary: With a plan to exact revenge on a mythical shark that killed his partner, Oceanographer Steve Zissou (Bill Murray) rallies a crew that includes his estranged wife, a journalist, and a man who may or may not be his son.

name: The Darjeeling Limited
summary: A year after their father's funeral, three brothers travel across India by train in an attempt to bond with each other.

name: Fantastic Mr. Fox
summary: An urbane fox cannot resist returning to his farm raiding ways and then must help his community survive the farmers' retaliation.

name: Moonrise Kingdom
summary: A pair of young lovers flee their New England town, which causes a local search party to fan out to find them.

name: The Grand Budapest Hotel
summary: A writer encounters the owner of an aging high-class hotel, who tells him of his early years serving as a lobby boy in the hotel's glorious years under an exceptional concierge.
